strapiEvent.name: 78th Annual Rodeo of the Ozarks
strapiEvent.description:
Watch heart-stopping rodeo competitors, incredibly talented acts, a seriously hilarious clown, heartwarming children’s events, western lifestyle vendors, and finger-licking good rodeo food.


Bring the family or come on your own; you won’t regret it!


  • Wednesday, June 21 – Faith & Family Night
  • Thursday, June 22 – Hispanic Heritage Night
  • Friday, June 23 – Rope Your Dreams Night | This is also Tough Enough to wear pink night, so wear your pink! The performance will be followed by “Last Call with David Adam Byrnes”, an up-and-coming red dirt country music artist.
  • Saturday, June 24 – Let Freedom Ring Night
